title: Don't trust the email from Riot
body:
A few days ago my account was stolen. I recieved THIS EMAIL from Riot saying I HAD NOTHING TO FKN WORRY ABOUT. NOW IT'S COMPLETELY THEIRS. 
If your account is valuable, don't trust this email. Change as many details asap if you see this. Cause they'll somehow fucking give it to them anyway.

replies.body: If they changed your password, that means they hacked your email and used the link. You need to check your computer for viruses/malicious programs and change your other passwords.
Good idea but nah, I use panda so definitely no virus' or trojans
This happened to my other account :( Have to start again now
Where'd you go, Who'd you see, Whom did you conquer

This guy seems so uneducated. In commerce we were learning about scams and stuff. NEVER click on someone's link cause they can do whatever they want when you enter that page. That email isn't from riot, its from a scammer, always vertify when sorting with account details unless they tell u to go directly to the site not from their link
Just in general, don't do click on anything from emails

It wasn't a scam. It wasn't a link. It was not any computer virus. You're assuming when I haven't even said how he got it. All I've said is he still got the account from me. He physically went through the process to get riot to give him the details.
Cant you vertify it with riot, since your account is connected to ur email?
Normally yeah but somehow he changed that too.

Yeah like Deep Terror Nami said, if you received this and then your account password changed, they have access to your email. I had a similar thing happen recently with someone making a Pinterest account (of all things?) with my email. Change your email password, reset your account's password and get that changed. Should solve the problem.
That's a bloody outrage that is. Im taking this all the way to the prime minister!
